bindAtlas() - Method in class GlooKit.GlooAPI.TextureAtlas
Binds the TextureAtlas to the GPU, thereby creating a concrete implementation This call can be rather intensive (up to half a frame) because it will pack the entire TextureAtlas

BOTTOM - Static variable in class GlooKit.GlooFramework.KitBit
Constant indicating that this KitBit should be bottom-justified within its container
Button - Class in GlooKit.GlooFramework
A Button is a KitBit that can perform an action when clicked on.
Button(int, int, String, String, Drawable, Label, Runnable) - Constructor for class GlooKit.GlooFramework.Button
Overloads the default Button constructor to take only an onClick() method and not an onHover() method or onMouseDown() method.
Button(int, int, String, String, Drawable, Label, Runnable, Runnable) - Constructor for class GlooKit.GlooFramework.Button
Overloads the default Button constructor to take an onClick() method and onHover() method, but not an onMouseDown() method.
Button(int, int, String, String, Drawable, Label, Runnable, Runnable, Runnable) - Constructor for class GlooKit.GlooFramework.Button
Constructs a Button given the normal parameters of the default KitBit constructor and a frame, a label, and up to three Runnables to be called when the Button is clicked, has the mouse over it, or when the mouse presses down on it.
byteBuffer - Variable in class GlooKit.GlooAPI.Texture
